title: Characterization of mercury in atmospheric particulate matter in the State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Luis Fhernando Mendonça da Silva, Caio Felix, Madson Nascimento, Jailson de Andrade, Maria Cristina Canela, Cibele Stivanin, Carla Semiramis, Renato Carreira, Adriana Gioda
Despite its low atmospheric concentration, mercury in particulate matter (PHg) significantly impacts its biogeochemical cycle. This research focused on the airborne mercury concentrations in fine particulate matter (PM2.5) collected from...
